string.text: 次のタスクに進め
次のタスクを受けろ
I need you to report to someone in the field. I have marked his location on your PDA.
幸運を祈るstalker。
Sniper
クズネツォフ少佐は、遠くから標的を排除するように命じた
I have a high-value target that has been located. He is not easy to get to so I need someone who is an extremely accurate long-range precision shooter.
すばらしい腕前だ。よくやった。
Assault Enemy Camp
敵陣営まで突撃部隊を導け。
敵陣営への攻撃を準備しています。 司令官は皆に新しい武器を用意しました。 初期攻撃ポイントに配置してください
素晴らしい仕事ぶりだ。立派な戦士だ。
軍事基地の防衛
敵の攻撃から軍事基地を守れ。
敵軍がこの地域で見つかった。司令官は、彼らが我々の基地に攻撃を仕掛けるのではないかと疑っている。あなたのチームを連れて連携を取り、敵軍を排除しろ
すばらしい仕事ぶりだ。よくやってくれた。
軍のエージェントを救え
A undercover agent needs to be extracted from a enemy faction, kill the other members of the squad and escort him back to the base. The spy has a SVD.

We have an agent undercover in an enemy faction however we fear he's being suspected, he missed the last few contacts and hasn't left any more messages. Probably he's being kept under watch so he can't afford to do anything besides playing along but they may decide to get rid of him without waiting for proof, we need to pull him out. We have located him nearby but he's with other stalkers, you need to kill them and escort him back. You can recognize him by his rifle, a SVD, he will have to shoot you back when you attack the group so keep it in mind.
Excellent, I'll have him report at once.
Stop shooting! I'm the spy! Sorry but had to keep up the show in case you had bad luck. Let's go back to base now.
This is where we part ways, see you again!
次のタスクに進め
Receive your next task.
One of our allies needs our help. Report to him and see what assistance you can give.
Good luck stalker.
Battle Plans
Lieutenant Kirilov has learned the location of enemy battle plans and needs them captured.
An informant has revealed the location of the enemy's battle plans. I need you to infiltrate the area and retrieve the plans.
よくやった！あんたはこれで多くの命を救ったぞ。
Patrol Local Area
Patrol the area around Agoroprom.
It's your turn for sentry duty. Patrol the local area and keep an eye out for any unauthorized personnel.
よく頑張ってくれたな。司令官は喜ぶだろう。
Becoming a Military Stalker
Bring 8,000 RU to Major Kuznetsov as a demonstration of your resourcefulness.

Ah, it's good to see some national pride among the youth of today! Let's see...well, you're way too irradiated to pass the physical exam for enlistment...I suppose you were instead thinking of getting commissioned as a Military Stalker, eh? We don't just let anyone in, you know.\n \nFirst bring 8,000 RU as proof of your ability to survive here, and then we can talk seriously about this.
Hmph, and so it is. You've profited where lesser troops would've died. Consider yourself recruited, soldier. Be sure to keep your nose clean out there.
Stop Unauthorized Incursions
許可されていない人物を排除するよう命じられました。

HQ is concerned about the rising number of incursions into the Zone. I want you to take a squad and sweep the local area for unauthorized personnel. Keep alert for any friendlies, but anyone else you see you are cleared to shoot on sight.
よくやった。その調子で頑張ってくれ、表彰式に並ぶことになるぞ。
Kuznetsovの領土を占領する
You have been ordered to capture territory within the Zone.
Our unit has been tasked with pushing further into the Zone. The commander is looking for volunteers to capture territory for us. Can I inform him of your cooperation?
タスクは完了したか？よくやった。すぐに指揮官にお前の成功を知らせよう。
敵の戦闘員を捕獲しろ
You have been assigned a hostile target to capture or kill.
HQ has a list of of most wanted individuals in the Zone. If you can get to any of them, there will be a bonus in your next paycheck. Are you up for the job?
目覚ましい仕事ぶりだ！司令官も喜んでいるだろう。
Tight Security
Kuznetsov wants to collect some %s.

Listen, soldier. The higher-ups want proof that we firmly control the area. That's rather difficult to claim with all the stalkers roaming about. Fortunately, the higher-ups won't check on that personally. As such, I want you to collect some patches that I will show them as proof we've secured the perimeter. Understood?

Listen, soldier. The higher-ups want proof that we firmly control the area. That's rather difficult to claim with all the stalkers roaming about. Fortunately, the higher-ups won't check on that personally. As such, I want you to collect some patches that I will show them as proof we've secured the perimeter. Understood? Bring me some %s and I'll reward your reliability.
Well done, soldier. Here's your bonus.
Recover Important Documents
Recover important documents and bring them back to Major.
Listen, soldier. Some stalker stole important documents from one of our outposts. I want you to recover them immediately.
Excellent job, soldier. We really don't want them to know too much.
Kirilovの %s を探す
%s are required by Kirilov to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Hey, can I ask you a favour? If you are interested in helping me out, I will tell you what I need.
I need a set of basic tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Great! You brought exactly what I've asked. Thanks.
Kirilovの%sを探す
%s are required by Kirilov to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Alright, If you are up for it, I need more tools. But they may be a bit harder to find. Can you do this for me?
I need a set of advanced tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Great! Come back any time if you need me to take a look at your gear.
Kirilovの %s を探す
%s are required by Kirilov to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
Alright, If you are up for it, I need more tools. But they may be a bit harder to find. Can you do this for me?
I need a set of expert tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Great! Come back any time if you need me to take a look at your gear.
Find %s
%s is required by Rogovets to work on medical supplies. You should bring them back to him if you find any.

Maintaining what's left from medical supplies storage with this number of injuries I have to treat on daily bias is worrying. I'm gonna run out of bandages and medkits soon or later. I need you to find me one of those old drug-making kits. They will come in handy for sure.

There is. I've been looking all over for a %s. It should contain some tablets and ampoules I need to do work on medical supplies. I'll pay you for one of these kits if you can bring a full set back to me.
Great job! I own you big time.
